localString.value: A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.
A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.
A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.
A portal glows softly before you. You wonder where it leads.

If you speak certain key phrases, you can alter certain characterisics about yourself:
"lvl XX", "level XX" - Set Level "gp XX", "gold XX" - Add/remove Gold "xp XX", "exp XX", "experience XX" - Add/remove Experience "ge XX", "good/evil XX" - Set Good/Evil Alignment Value "lc XX", "law/chaos XX" - Set Lawful/Chaotic Alignment Value Where "XX" is a number "reset levels", "reset me" - Reset All Levels (USE CAUTION) "recharge", "recharge me" - Recharge All Items
(not implemented at the moment) "shop X" - Open Shop Where X is: "ac" - Armor - Clothing "ah" - Armor - Heavy "al" - Armor - Light "am" - Armor - Medium "cam" - Campaign Items "clothing" - Clothing (Belts, Boots, etc.) "craft" - Crafting Items "helmsh" - Helmets and Shields "magic" - Scrolls and Mage Specific Equipment "misc" - Miscellaneous and Plot Items "potion" - Potions and Healing Kits "ringam" - Rings, Amulets and Gems "rogue" - Trap Kits and Thieves Tools "tavern" - Alcoholic Beverages "wl" - Weapons - Large Melee "wm" - Weapons - Medium Melee "wr" - Weapons - Ranged "ws" - Weapons - Small Melee
